description:
"I wish I had seen this video before I put my advert out of Facebook as she would have saved me money, which when you are a small business every penny counts" - Joan W

Too busy running your micro business to keep up with what's working now in social media marketing?

As a micro business owner you're responsible for everything in your business so it's hard to keep up with what works in social media marketing. It really is crucial that you keep up to date so that you don't waste precious time on strategies that no longer work.

That's why I've put together five quick videos explaining what you need to know about these trends, plus a handy PDF that you can print off and use as you implement what you've learned in the course.

In this quick course you'll discover:

  • The 5 essential trends in social media
  • The reasons why you must to stay on top of these trends
  • 12 quick and easy tactics for implementing them in your business

Take this course now and start implementing these strategies today!

(Last updated December 2015)
title: 5 Essential Social Media Trends for Micro Businesses
